commandDescription.en-US: Makes you exit the waiting room
commandDescription.fr: Te fait sortir de la salle d'attente
commandDescription.pt-BR: Makes you exit the waiting room

help.en-US: Type $<commandMention> to exit the waiting room
help.fr: Tape $<commandMention> pour sortir de la salle d'attente
help.pt-BR: Type $<commandMention> to exit the waiting room

reply.en-US: I have handled your verification. Welcome to the official *$<name>* *Discord* server!
reply.fr: J'ai géré ta vérification. Bienvenue sur le serveur *Discord* officiel de *$<name>* !
reply.pt-BR: I have handled your verification. Welcome to the official *$<name>* *Discord* server!

noPermissionReply.en-US: I do not have the rights to handle your verification.
noPermissionReply.fr: Je n'ai pas les droits pour gérer ta vérification.
noPermissionReply.pt-BR: I do not have the rights to handle your verification.
